answerText: databases[10] This operation is used to link multiple tables together based on attributes that their columns have in common. The "inner" type of this operation in SQL is a generalization of the "natural" type in relational algebra.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | LASA A-Truman State A-Penn B | 19 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these computer systems that can be queried using languages like SQL. "Relational" ones consist of tables in which each row is uniquely identified by a primary key.
